fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Energy, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Mediation and Dialogue, EU Foreign Policy and External Relations, CFSP, Neighbourhood Policy, Enlargement, Development Policy.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: The EIP is member of the European Peacebuilding Liaison Office (EPLO), http://eplo.org/.
goals__remit: The EIP is an independent partner to the European Union and Europe, augmenting its global peace agenda through mediation and informal dialogue. The Institute pursues multi-track diplomacy and acts as a flexible, external tool in support of EU mediation efforts where the EU has limited freedom to act. It also serves as an operational hub, and connects existing expertise and shares knowledge and lessons on European mediation.
